name: Restless Slumber
description:
Traverse puzzle rooms which are supposed to be bedrooms but apparently they have portals and legos that can pierce through your slippers in them, so beware.

I mean seriously the legos are so deadly they easily pierce through your slippers. Avoid them at all costs!

This game was made for the LibGDX Jam of December 2020. It was made by RedSponge with help in assets and levels from Sivan & Amit.

This game was made in two days so it isn't very polished - expect bugs!
